name: TIDAL
0:
”Alexa, Play Beyoncé on TIDAL”
”Alexa, Play Barbie Dreams by Nicki Minaj on TIDAL”
”Alexa, Play music by Rihanna on TIDAL”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Stream your favorite songs and discover new music on TIDAL, with the largest streaming catalog available, completely ad-free.

With your TIDAL subscription and the TIDAL skill for Alexa, you can listen to any of the millions of songs available on TIDAL. You can ask TIDAL to play music from a specific playlist on TIDAL or ask for your favorite artist or song by name. 

To get started, click the ""Enable"" button or say ""Alexa, open TIDAL"" to open the skill. 

1. Log in to your Alexa companion app (on phone or desktop) 
2. Follow the steps to install TIDAL 
3. Click on ""Link your account” 
4. In the TIDAL login window, log in with your user details

Listen to your favorite music
Play your favorite classics and discover new artists with tens of millions of songs available without lifting a finger.

Completely ad-free.
Enjoy music the way artists intended with no interruptions. From your favorite songs and albums to our hand-curated playlists. All you need is a TIDAL Premium or HiFi subscription.

The highest quality audio available on Alexa 
No compromises. Just pure sound and video. Enjoy your music the way the artists intended.

Exclusive content
Be the first to experience music you can’t get anywhere else.

Coming soon: The ability to play your personal playlists. Stay tuned for future updates!
